name: NFC RTS Prototype
description:
Prototype #3 / 11

This game is one of the prototypes made in a week (two) as part of the "souls-like prototyping" challenge.

  • Genre: real-time strategy
  • Unusual game mechanics: control over units without a free camera, camera is a unit

Controls:

  • LMB - Select unit
  • Hold LMB - Select multiple units
  • L.Ctrl + LMB - Add / Remove unit from selected units
  • RMB - Set target / Move to
  • Mouse wheel - Zoom
  • W, A, S, D - Move (if only drone is selected)
